foods.name: French Onion Soup
foods.description: Slow simmered sweet onions, topped with savory Swiss Cheese and garnished with croutons.

foods.name: Soy Marinaeted Wagyu Beef
foods.description: Marbled Japanese Wagyu beef fillet marinated in soy sauce for 48 hours. Tender and flavourful.

foods.name: Pulpo a la Galegga
foods.description: Gallician style boiled fresh-caught octopus served on potato bed and seasoned with sweet or spicy paprika.

foods.name: Zesty Salmon Filet
foods.description: Oven-baked salmon filet served with a garlic-infused citrusy sauce. Kosher product.

foods.name: Hummus Mezze
foods.description: An assortment of 4 hummus plates: plain, with avocado, with paprika and with truffle oil. Vegan friendly.
